title: LX-980 Lancet
wikitext:

'''Affiliation''': New Republic

Space Range: 1-3/12/25
Atmosphere Range: 100-300/1.2/2.5 km
Damage: 4D '''Note''': This is the standard starfighter used by the Galactic Republic Judicial Department. The craft is a wingless, sleek starfighter with an upraised fin in the rear of the ship. It boasts a light armament, but is typically used for Coruscant-authorized actions which may call for starfighter engagement. Unlike the Republic Defender, the Corellian Lancet is used solely by the Coruscant-based Judicial Department, and is not sold to other worlds. Because it tends to be the symbol of Republic authority in space, criminals tend to flee when they spot one.
